statement: Women suffering from both claustrophobia and IBS or not eligible for either the primary trial or the secondary trial.
primary_evidence: Women are eligible to participate if they are 40 years or older and have been menopausal (had no menstrual bleeding during the past 12 months)
History of bilateral mastectomy, osteoporosis or renal impairment.
secondary_evidence: Women with a clinically or mammographically identified suspicious breast mass that is likely to be biopsied or surgically removed.
History of shotgun wounds and shrapnel
Major surgeries with potential of ferromagnetic implants
i-STAT system, a handheld blood analyzer (I-STAT) creatinine test, estimated glomerular filtration rate (GFR) <30
Metallic object (greater than 2 cm in length) in the breast
Metallic ink tatoo within 20 cm of the breast (approximately 8 inches)
